commands.commandNotFound: Command `@@%s` does not exist! Try out `@@help` or `@@commands`
commands.commandNotPermitted: You are not allowed to execute `@@%s`.
commands.commandWronglyPosted: The `@@%s` command is not meant to be excecuted here - use a %s message instead
commands.maintenance: **BOT MAINTENANCE!** Bot is going down for maintenance soon - Please be patient

usage.channels: Type `@@channels` to get info about the server
usage.commandNotFound: not meant to be used directly
usage.commandNotPermitted: not meant to be used directly
usage.commands: Type `@@commands` to get a list of commands available for you in the current scope
usage.commandWronglyPosted: not meant to be used directly
usage.docs: Type `@@docs` to see the link to osu!api documentation
usage.help:
Type `@@help <COMMAND>` to get help for the command.

Type `@@help` to see this message.
Type `@@commands` to see a list of commands
usage.logout: Type `@@logout` to log out the bot and terminate the connection to Discord.
usage.maintenance: Type `@@maintenance` to send a maintenance notification message to **ALL servers**
usage.mods: Type `@@mods` to see the mods definition (bitwise enum)
usage.release: Type `@@release` to send a release notification message to **ALL servers**
